channel.title: [PI] Client and Cache questions
channel.description:
I was wondering could I rip the
flo.dat map_index loc.idx loc.dat
from a 666 cache and dump it to my PI cache using Tom's cache suite. I have seen 4 people that have managed to do this and one of those people is "Skiller 99" and he uses everything 666 on a PI. Just wondering if anyone on here could tell me how to do it thanks.

item.title: [PI] Client and Cache questions
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I assume you could do it, but I wouldn’t know where to start.

Read full topic
